description:
Amazon WorkSpaces plays nice with everyone. Access your personal Windows environment on Android, iOS, Fire, Mac, PC, Chromebook, and Linux devices.


- [Windows and macOS] Updated the name for the WSP protocol to Amazon DCV protocol
- [Windows and macOS] Added support for streaming over port 443 for TCP and UDP protocols on DCV WorkSpaces
- [Windows and macOS] Updated the .NET SDK
- [Windows and macOS] Bug fixes and enhancements
- [Windows only] Added support for file upload and download on DCV WorkSpaces
